dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6257 IH: Emergency Medical Services Reimbursement for On-Scene and Support Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Balint introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide Medicare coverage of ambulance services that do not include transportation.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Emergency Medical Services Reimbursement for On-Scene and Support Act.

section.header: Coverage of ambulance services that do not include transportation
section.text: Section 1861(s)(7) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395x(s)(7)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), as added by paragraph (1), by inserting and after the semicolon; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: notwithstanding subparagraph (A), ambulance service includes such services described in such subparagraph that are furnished on or after January 1, 2025, to an individual by a provider or supplier of ambulance services regardless of whether the provider or supplier provides the transport for the individual at a reimbursement comparable to the transport reimbursement;
